messages.body: Mention of an "iPhone xx" shows up in $AAPL's Xcode. https://investorplace.com/2018/08/apple-2018-smartphone-lineup-may-include-iphone-xx/

links.title: Wednesday Apple Rumors: 2018 Smartphone Lineup May Include 'iPhone xx' | InvestorPlace
links.description: http://bit.ly/2w6RyWx Leading the Apple (NASDAQ:AAPL ) rumor mill today is news of an "iPhone xx". Today, we'll look at that and other Apple Rumors for Wednesday. iPhone xx: Code inside Xcode 10 mentions a possible iPhone xx, reports 9to5Mac. It's unknown if this code is referring to one of the new mobile devices coming out in 2018.

links.title: Netflix Pokes Apple, Tests Bypassing App Store Subscription Payments
links.description: http://bit.ly/2NabL4v Apple (NASDAQ:) is increasingly looking to its Services division for revenue to reduce reliance on iPhone sales. It's also hard at work on a streaming video service. Netflix (NASDAQ:) has the third-highest-grossing app on the App Store, but is struggling with slowing subscriber growth and is looking for ways to reduce expenses.
